# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a remarkable investment worth over $100 in my opinion. This product has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $125. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the superior performance and craftsmanship of our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
